Adzikhazikitsa mafumu a dziko lapansi,nachita upo akulu pamodzi,Kutsutsana naye Yehova, ndi Wodzozedwa wake, ndi kuti,
Pomwepo adzalankhula nao mu mkwiyo wake,nadzawaopsa m'ukali wake.
Koma Ine ndadzoza mfumu yangaPa Ziyoni, phiri langa loyera.
Ndidzauza za chitsimikizo:Yehova ananena ndi Ine,Iwe ndiwe Mwana wanga; Ine lero ndakubala.
Undifunse, ndipo ndidzakupatsa amitunduakhale cholowa chako,ndi malekezero a dziko lapansi akhale akoako.
Udzawathyola ndi ndodo yachitsulo;udzawaphwanya monga mbiya ya woumba.
Tsono, mafumu inu, chitani mwanzeru;langikani, oweruza inu a dziko lapansi.
Tumikirani Yehova ndi mantha,ndipo kondwerani ndi chinthenthe.
Mpsompsoneni Mwanayo, kuti angakwiye,ndipo mungatayike m'njiraukayaka pang'ono pokha mkwiyo wake.Odala onse akumkhulupirira Iye.
